metadata.title: CVE-2016-0803 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: libstagefright in mediaserver in Android 4.x before 4.4.4, 5.x before 5.1.1LMY49G, and 6.x before 2016-02-01 allows remote attackers to executearbitrary code or cause a denial of service (memory corruption) via acrafted media file that triggers a large memory allocation in the (1)SoftMPEG4Encoder or (2) SoftVPXEncoder component, aka internal bug25812794.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
